title: Blaze and the Monster Machines Boys' Robe
features: Kids Blaze & The Monster Machines dressing gown
Ace your race at Axle City, and then cosy up in this brilliant Blaze dressing gown
This navy robe has a hood, tie belt, front pockets and a super soft fluffy feel
Featuring an all over print of all things Blaze and The Monster Machines, with an embroidered badge on the chest
Officially licensed Blaze and The Monster Machines merchandise
description: Boys Blaze and the Monster Machines dressing gown. Ace your race at Axle City, and then cosy up in this brilliant Blaze dressing gown! Crafted in a soft fluffy material, this bath robe is perfect for your little racer to relax in after a day at the races. It features a hood, tie waistband, two front pockets, with an all over motif of all things Blaze & The Monster Machines.
